thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lyondellbasell Posts Q4 Earnings $4.80/Shr From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lyondellbasell Posts Q4 Earnings $4.80/Shr From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Lyondellbasell Industries Nv:
* LYONDELLBASELL REPORTS 2017 EARNINGS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.80 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * U.S. TAX REFORM PROVIDED AN $819 MILLION ONE-TIME, NON-CASH BENEFIT IN Q4
* QTRLY SALES AND OTHER OPERATING REVENUES $9,135 MILLION VERSUS $7,747 MILLION
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $8.79 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * STRONG GLOBAL DEMAND AND DELAYS IN CAPACITY ADDITIONS ACROSS INDUSTRY HAVE IMPROVED OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* ‍NET EFFECT OF BOND REFINANCING, GEOSEL GAIN, TAX REFORM BENEFIT POSITIVELY IMPACTED FY 2017 EARNINGS BY $2.05 PER SHARE​
* LYONDELLBASELL - ‍ONE-TIME, NON-CASH BENEFIT FROM U.S. TAX REFORM REDUCED NET DEFERRED TAX LIABILITIES AND INCREASED EARNINGS BY $2.07 PER SHARE IN Q4 ​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.56 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
